modules.comments: This module defines a type `Drawing` for creating vector graphics.

declarations.comments: Create a rectangle from the left, top, width and height parameters.
declarations.title: rectangle

declarations.comments: Create a circle from the left, top and radius parameters.
declarations.title: circle

declarations.comments:
Create a circular arc from the left, top, start angle, end angle and
radius parameters.
declarations.title: arc

declarations.comments: Apply a scale transformation by providing the x and y scale factors.
declarations.title: scale

declarations.comments: Apply a translation by providing the x and y distances.
declarations.title: translate

declarations.comments: Apply a rotation by providing the angle.
declarations.title: rotate

declarations.comments: Modify a `Drawing` by applying a transformation to every subdrawing.
declarations.title: everywhere

modules.name: Graphics.Drawing

declarations.comments:
The representation of a color.

Note:
- The `Eq` instance compares two `Color`s by comparing their (integer) RGB
  values. This is different from comparing the HSL values (for example,
  HSL has many different representations of black (arbitrary hue and
  saturation values).
- Colors outside the sRGB gamut which cannot be displayed on a typical
  computer screen can not be represented by `Color`.
declarations.title: Color

modules.comments: This module defines preset fonts, and functions for creating fonts.

declarations.comments: Turn a `Font` into a `String` which can be used with `Graphics.Canvas.setFont`.
declarations.title: fontString

modules.name: Graphics.Drawing.Font
